parentDataList.nodeContext: (viewScaleType == ViewScaleType.FIT_INSIDE && widthScale >= heightScale) || (viewScaleType == ViewScaleType.CROP && widthScale < heightScale)

currentLineData.nodeContext: (viewScaleType == ViewScaleType.FIT_INSIDE && widthScale >= heightScale) || (viewScaleType == ViewScaleType.CROP && widthScale < heightScale)
